de.awi.floenavigation.admin

Class ListViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ListViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • de.awi.floenavigation.admin.ListViewAdapter

  • class ListViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ListViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Class to generate the RecyclerView.Adapter which will be used as an input to RecyclerView to initialize the layout
